text.autoconfig.nekomusic.title: NekoMusic Config
text.autoconfig.nekomusic.option.musicCa: Music Cache Max Size (MB), -1 = Unlimited, 0 = Disable. Requires restart.
§cNote that the space check is performed when the game starts, so it might exceed the limit during runtime.
text.autoconfig.nekomusic.option.imgCach: Cover Cache Max Size (MB), -1 = Unlimited, 0 = Disable. Requires restart.
§cNote that the space check is performed when the game starts, so it might exceed the limit during runtime.
text.autoconfig.nekomusic.option.cachePa: §cPlease make sure that the path is valid and writable. Don't use any directory that may contain any other files, as they might be deleted by the mod.
§eTip: If you are using multi platforms or your game is installed in a removable disk, you may want to use a relative path or environment variables.
text.autoconfig.nekomusic.option.allmusi: This allows you to use this mod in servers that use Coloryr's AllMusic. Requires restart.
§cCurrently only music playback is supported, the hud will be omitted. And this is not guaranteed to work properly.
text.autoconfig.nekomusic.option.enableH: Enable Cover Rotate §e(Takes effect after next song)
text.autoconfig.nekomusic.option.respons: Response Size Limit (MB), -1 = Unlimited. Should be more than 10 if you set a positive value. Requires restart. §lOnly applies to music§l (cover's size is hardcoded to 5MB).
§eThis might help you mitigate some wrongly configured servers (e.g. accidentally send a 1GB music) that send too much data, but not guaranteed to work in all cases.
§eThis should not be considered as a security feature. If your server send large data on purpose to break the client, personally I would recommend you to find a better server.
